verses.verse: Then we turned,<WH6437> and took<WH5265> our journey<WH5265> into the wilderness<WH4057> by the way<WH1870> of the Red<WH5488> sea,<WH3220> as the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to me: and we compassed<WH5437> mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165> many<WH7227> days.<WH3117>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to me, saying,<WH559>
You have compassed<WH5437> this<WH2088> mountain<WH2022> long<WH7227> enough: turn<WH6437> you northward.<WH6828>

And command<WH6680> you the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> You are to pass<WH5674> through the coast<WH1366> of your brothers<WH251> the children<WH1121> of Esau,<WH6215> which dwell<WH3427> in Seir;<WH8165> and they shall be afraid<WH3372> of you: take you good<WH3966> heed<WH8104> to yourselves therefore:

Meddle<WH1624> not with them; for I will not give<WH5414> you of their land,<WH776> no, not so much<WH5704> as a foot<WH7272> breadth;<WH4096> because<WH3588> I have given<WH5414> mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165> to Esau<WH6215> for a possession.<WH3425>
You shall buy<WH7666> meat<WH400> of them for money,<WH3701> that you may eat;<WH398> and you shall also<WH1571> buy<WH3739> water<WH4325> of them for money,<WH3701> that you may drink.<WH8354>

For the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has blessed<WH1288> you in all<WH3605> the works<WH4639> of your hand:<WH3027> he knows<WH3045> your walking<WH3212> through this<WH2088> great<WH1419> wilderness:<WH4057> these<WH2088> forty<WH705> years<WH8141> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has been with you; you have lacked<WH2637> nothing.<WH3808>

And when we passed<WH5674> by from our brothers<WH251> the children<WH1121> of Esau,<WH6215> which dwelled<WH3427> in Seir,<WH8165> through the way<WH1870> of the plain<WH6160> from Elath,<WH359> and from Eziongaber,<WH6100> we turned<WH6437> and passed<WH5674> by the way<WH1870> of the wilderness<WH4057> of Moab.<WH4124>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, Distress<WH6696> not the Moabites,<WH4124> neither<WH408> contend<WH1624> with them in battle:<WH4421> for I will not give<WH5414> you of their land<WH776> for a possession;<WH3425> because<WH3588> I have given<WH5414> Ar<WH6144> to the children<WH1121> of Lot<WH3876> for a possession.<WH3425>
The Emims<WH368> dwelled<WH3427> therein in times past, a people<WH5971> great,<WH1419> and many,<WH7227> and tall,<WH7311> as the Anakims;<WH6062>
Which<WH1992> also<WH637> were accounted<WH2803> giants,<WH7497> as the Anakims;<WH6062> but the Moabites<WH4125> called<WH7121> them Emims.<WH368>

The Horims<WH2752> also dwelled<WH3427> in Seir<WH8165> beforetime;<WH6440> but the children<WH1121> of Esau<WH6215> succeeded<WH3423> them, when they had destroyed<WH8045> them from before<WH6440> them, and dwelled<WH3427> in their stead;<WH8478> as Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> to the land<WH776> of his possession,<WH3425> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> gave<WH5414> to them.
Now<WH6258> rise<WH6965> up, said I, and get<WH5674> you over<WH5674> the brook<WH5158> Zered.<WH2218> And we went<WH5674> over<WH5674> the brook<WH5158> Zered.<WH2218>

And the space<WH3117> in which<WH834> we came<WH1980> from Kadeshbarnea,<WH6947> until<WH5704> we were come<WH5674> over<WH5674> the brook<WH5158> Zered,<WH2218> was thirty<WH7970> and eight<WH8083> years;<WH8141> until<WH5704> all<WH3605> the generation<WH1755> of the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> were wasted<WH8552> out from among<WH7130> the host,<WH4264> as the LORD<WH3068> swore<WH7650> to them.
For indeed<WH1571> the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was against them, to destroy<WH2000> them from among<WH7130> the host,<WH4264> until<WH5704> they were consumed.<WH8552>
So it came<WH1961> to pass, when<WH834> all<WH3605> the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> were consumed<WH8552> and dead<WH4191> from among<WH7130> the people,<WH5971>
That the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to me, saying,<WH559>
You are to pass<WH5674> over<WH5674> through Ar,<WH6144> the coast<WH1366> of Moab,<WH4124> this day:<WH3117>

And when you come<WH7126> near<WH7126> over<WH4136> against<WH4136> the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> distress<WH6696> them not, nor<WH408> meddle<WH1624> with them: for I will not give<WH5414> you of the land<WH776> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> any possession;<WH3425> because<WH3588> I have given<WH5414> it to the children<WH1121> of Lot<WH3876> for a possession.<WH3425>
(That also<WH637> was accounted<WH2803> a land<WH776> of giants:<WH7497> giants<WH7497> dwelled<WH3427> therein in old<WH6440> time; and the Ammonites<WH5984> call<WH7121> them Zamzummims;<WH2157>

A people<WH5971> great,<WH1419> and many,<WH7227> and tall,<WH7311> as the Anakims;<WH6062> but the LORD<WH3068> destroyed<WH8045> them before<WH6440> them; and they succeeded<WH3423> them, and dwelled<WH3427> in their stead:<WH8478>

As he did<WH6213> to the children<WH1121> of Esau,<WH6215> which dwelled<WH3427> in Seir,<WH8165> when<WH834> he destroyed<WH8045> the Horims<WH2752> from before<WH6440> them; and they succeeded<WH3423> them, and dwelled<WH3427> in their stead<WH8478> even to this<WH2088> day:<WH3117>

And the Avims<WH5757> which dwelled<WH3427> in Hazerim,<WH2699> even to Azzah,<WH5804> the Caphtorims,<WH3732> which came<WH3318> forth<WH3318> out of Caphtor,<WH3731> destroyed<WH8045> them, and dwelled<WH3427> in their stead.<WH8478>)

Rise<WH6965> you up, take your journey,<WH5265> and pass<WH5674> over<WH5674> the river<WH5158> Arnon:<WH769> behold,<WH7200> I have given<WH5414> into your hand<WH3027> Sihon<WH5511> the Amorite,<WH567> king<WH4428> of Heshbon,<WH2809> and his land:<WH776> begin<WH2490> to possess<WH3423> it, and contend<WH1624> with him in battle.<WH4421>

This<WH2088> day<WH3117> will I begin<WH2490> to put<WH5414> the dread<WH6343> of you and the fear<WH3374> of you on the nations<WH5971> that are under<WH8478> the whole<WH3605> heaven,<WH8064> who<WH834> shall hear<WH8085> report<WH8088> of you, and shall tremble,<WH7264> and be in anguish<WH2342> because<WH6440> of you.
And I sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> out of the wilderness<WH4057> of Kedemoth<WH6932> to Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon<WH2809> with words<WH1697> of peace,<WH7965> saying,<WH559>
Let me pass<WH5674> through your land:<WH776> I will go<WH3212> along by the high<WH1870> way,<WH1870> I will neither<WH3808> turn<WH5493> to the right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> nor to the left.<WH8040>

You shall sell<WH7666> me meat<WH400> for money,<WH3701> that I may eat;<WH398> and give<WH5414> me water<WH4325> for money,<WH3701> that I may drink:<WH8354> only<WH7535> I will pass<WH5674> through on<WH5921> my feet;<WH7272>

(As the children<WH1121> of Esau<WH6215> which dwell<WH3427> in Seir,<WH8165> and the Moabites<WH4125> which dwell<WH3427> in Ar,<WH6144> did<WH6213> to me;) until<WH5704> I shall pass<WH5674> over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> gives<WH5414> us.

But Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon<WH2809> would<WH14> not let us pass<WH5674> by him: for the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hardened<WH7185> his spirit,<WH7307> and made his heart<WH3824> obstinate,<WH553> that he might deliver<WH5414> him into your hand,<WH3027> as appears this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, Behold,<WH7200> I have begun<WH2490> to give<WH5414> Sihon<WH5511> and his land<WH776> before<WH6440> you: begin<WH2490> to possess,<WH3423> that you may inherit<WH3423> his land.<WH776>
Then Sihon<WH5511> came<WH3318> out against<WH7125> us, he and all<WH3605> his people,<WH5971> to fight<WH4421> at Jahaz.<WH3096>
And the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> delivered<WH5414> him before<WH6440> us; and we smote<WH5221> him, and his sons,<WH1121> and all<WH3605> his people.<WH5971>

And we took<WH3920> all<WH3605> his cities<WH5892> at that time,<WH6256> and utterly destroyed<WH2763> the men,<WH4962> and the women,<WH802> and the little<WH2945> ones, of every<WH3605> city,<WH5892> we left<WH7604> none<WH3808> to remain:<WH8300>
Only<WH7535> the cattle<WH929> we took for a prey<WH962> to ourselves, and the spoil<WH7998> of the cities<WH5892> which<WH834> we took.<WH3920>

From Aroer,<WH6177> which<WH834> is by the brink<WH8193> of the river<WH5158> of Arnon,<WH769> and from the city<WH5892> that is by the river,<WH5158> even to Gilead,<WH1568> there was not one city<WH7151> too strong<WH7682> for us: the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> delivered<WH5414> all<WH3605> to us:

Only<WH7535> to the land<WH776> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> you came<WH7126> not, nor to any<WH3605> place<WH3027> of the river<WH5158> Jabbok,<WH2999> nor to the cities<WH5892> in the mountains,<WH2022> nor to whatever<WH3605> the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> forbade<WH6680> us.
